mapper.sql: t_id, parent_id, total_amount, recharge_num, recharge_amount, withdraw_num, withdraw_amount, up_award_amount, lower_award_amount, under_commission, agent_commission, install_num
mapper.select: SELECT sum(total_amount) as total_amount, sum(recharge_num) as recharge_num, sum(recharge_amount) as recharge_amount, sum(withdraw_num) as withdraw_num, sum(withdraw_amount) as withdraw_amount, sum(up_award_amount) as up_award_amount, sum(lower_award_amount) as lower_award_amount, sum(under_commission) as under_commission, sum(agent_commission) as agent_commission, sum(install_num) as install_num FROM sys_tenant_statistics
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_tenant_statistics
t_id,
parent_id,
total_amount,
recharge_num,
recharge_amount,
withdraw_num,
withdraw_amount,
up_award_amount,
lower_award_amount,
under_commission,
agent_commission,
install_num,

#{rechargeNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update sys_tenant_statistics
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recharge_num = #{rechargeNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
withdraw_num = #{withdrawNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
withdraw_amount = #{withdrawAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_award_amount = #{upAwardAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lower_award_amount = #{lowerAwardAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
under_commission = #{underCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
agent_commission = #{agentCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
install_num = #{installNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_tenant_statistics set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recharge_num = #{rechargeNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdraw_num = #{withdrawNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, withdraw_amount = #{withdrawAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_award_amount = #{upAwardAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lower_award_amount = #{lowerAwardAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, under_commission = #{underCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, agent_commission = #{agentCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, install_num = #{installNum,jdbcType=BIGINT} where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
